md:
giải nghĩa từ "hairy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Hairy (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Having a lot of hair, especially on the body.
	+ Vietnamese: Lông lá, nhiều lông
	+ Example sentence: He's a hairy guy, so he always has to shave carefully.
	+ Related words: hair, hairy arms, hairy chest

* Hairy (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Difficult or complicated.
	+ Vietnamese: Khó khăn, phức tạp
	+ Example sentence: The math problem was hairy, so I had to ask for help.
	+ Related words: tricky, complicated, difficult
html:
giải nghĩa từ "hairy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Hairy (adjective)

    • Meaning: Having a lot of hair, especially on the body.
    • Vietnamese: Lông lá, nhiều lông
    • Example sentence: He's a hairy guy, so he always has to shave carefully.
    • Related words: hair, hairy arms, hairy chest

  • Hairy (adjective)

    • Meaning: Difficult or complicated.
    • Vietnamese: Khó khăn, phức tạp
    • Example sentence: The math problem was hairy, so I had to ask for help.
    • Related words: tricky, complicated, difficult
